amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute replaced the language of the bill with the text of the the "Christopher and Dana Reeve Quality of Life for Persons with Paralysis Act".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barton (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Barton (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barton (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Barton (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
